name: Dong Paloh Hostel & Cafe
address: Br. Dinas Taman, Jl. Kayu Putih - Munduk, Munduk, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: The staff was amazing. We arrived and they offered us some tea and carried all of our luggage to the bedroom. There was a website with a variety of activities and tours u could do and the staff booked a tour for us last minute. We also rented a motorbike from them. The food and service was also amazing. We recommend this place 100%! üòä
review 2:
An adorable place with just one shared dorm room. It‚Äôs clean, spacious and calm with comfy beds.
The view from the balcony is lovely and staff is always helpful & friendly.
The caf√© downstairs is also great.
Short ride to Munduk waterfalls and generally good location to reach other sights in the area.
Highly recommend üíó
review 3:
Clean dorms and nice comfy beds, great hike nearby you can do without a scooter. total of 7 travellers stay here, so it‚Äôs quite a small hostel. I think munduk will probably attract more backpackers in future, good place to escape the hustle and bustle of Ubud .
One suggestion id give is emailing guests before they arrive with the guide to the hostel/ area which was really useful and has info on the trek
review 4: Lovely place with very welcoming hosts. Dorms were clean, lockers were secure, and the view is great. The cafe food is really good too!
review 5:
Nice hostel, the dorm is clean and bed are comfortable. The view from the dorm is beautiful as well. The family is really friendly and they served good food
Thanks üôè

name: Amartya Puri Green Cottages, Garden Cottages in magic mountains
address: Banyuatis, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81161, Indonesia
review 1:
Simple rooms, with some wear and tear, but clean and comfortable.
The pool is tucked away inside a wall of trees, which means you can't get close to the pool after a swim, but on the other hand, each villa, most of which face the pool, has a huge garden where you can relax.
The staff are extremely friendly.
Near the hotel there is a small warung that opens at 10am and closes at 10pm, but if you want another one, you have to walk a few kilometers.
review 2: A big thank you to the whole team of this hotel who took care of our family, the children were in paradise and even did a fishing activity on site, basketball, badbinton. Very clean rooms and maintained establishment, beautiful view of the rice fields. Transport service on site with a pleasant driver.
review 3: Beautiful garden and surroundings. Spacious room. Personnel is super friendly and help with taxi and other recommendations. The food at the restaurant was delicious.
review 4: Amazing stay, everything was great. Wonderful treatment, service and response. The place is like an oasis in the middle of the mountains, it‚Äôs the perfect place to switch off and go off the grid, you don‚Äôt need anything else than to be here. I will come back for sure, Putu and his staff are nice, welcoming and will do whatever is needed to make you feel like home, and the did it in my case. Congrats and thanks ü•ã
review 5: The location and views are fantastic. Friendly staff, scooter available, 10 mins ride from restaurants in Munduk. The whole Munduk region is gorgeous. Negetives: the rooms are fine but not so spacious, and, surprisingly, no aircon (in our 45 Euro/night room) which is unusual and was quite sweaty!

name: NADIRA BALI VILLA
address: Jl. Gobleg, Gobleg, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81161, Indonesia
review 1: Really lovely and caring staff. Beautiful jungle views, awesome swimming pool! Unfortunately, I had an allergic reaction while staying and needed to leave, they were happy to refund the rest of our stay which was a shame but I appreciate them being considerate to my needs.
review 2: Nadira Bali Villa exceeded all expectations! The serene ambiance of the place, coupled with spacious and immaculately clean rooms, made for a perfect retreat. The staff was not only friendly but also went above and beyond to ensure our comfort. A special shoutout to the friendly driver who not only safely transported us to our next hotel but also shared insights into local attractions along the way‚Äîall at a fair price. Exceptional service and a 5-star experience!
review 3:
Our stay at Nadira was truly exceptional.  The staff were attentive to our every need . Putu was utterly gracious and and offered to take us to the nearby waterfalls and walk us through  the jungle back to the villa ,recognising that we were new to Munduk and not aware of the time ,location and km's our intended track would take .
Nadira Villa is the place to stay to explore Munduk. A sanctuary from the elements and brilliant staff. Friendly and extremely attentive.  Fabulous location . Our adventure in Munduk was made all the more memorable by all at Nadira Villa Bali. Regards Ivone & Nigel
review 4:
We had a fantastic stay in Nadira Bali villa during our stay in Bali! The location is great, even if a bit remote from Munduk village. We had a private Villa with our own pool, facing the beautiful jungle! Amazing view and relaxing area!
The staff made our stay fantastic, from the warm welcoming up to the ‚Äúdetails oriented‚Äù greetings every day! The restaurant and breakfast are nice, with some decent food options in a beautiful environment (facing the jungle). The staff even gave us some chocolate beans from the garden!
review 5:
Very friendly service. Great food, nice views and good value for money. They organised a wonderful dinner for us in the villa and decorated it beautifully with flowers.  Fantastic massage therapists and car service to take you to Munduk Moding Plantation and resort for the day or for longer transfers.
Not a huge amount of hot water and the steps to the restaurant may be a little difficult for those with mobility issues.

name: Da'Kayu Bali homestay & warung
address: Jl. Gobleg, Jembong, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1:
Hidden gem of Bali if you want to visit Munduk.

Doni was the best host we had during our trip in Indonesia. He provided us with a bike and gave us advices on the best spots to visit in the region. He was super friendly and helpful by cooking us good meals as well as organizing our transport for our next destination.

The place was very clean, calm and relaxing. If you like nature and beautiful sunsets you should definitely go to Da‚ÄôKayu !
review 2: A fantastic place and fantastic people, thanks to Doni and his family. The food was delicious
review 3: Perfect place to know the waterfalls and hike into the jungle around Munduk. It is located in a small village with a nice rice field views and it serves delicious breakfast and dinner. The host, Doni, couldn''t be better: helping for the trip preparation, giving tips about excursions, sharing balinese culture, ... he is truly an amazing person !
review 4: Amazing place and a real hidden gem! Toni is a wonderful host and we had a blast drinking some homemade Arak together! Really calm and beautiful place!
review 5: Very clean, peaceful and friendly host. Very near to munduk waterfall. Highly recommended in munduk area.

name: Karang Sari Guesthouse
address: Jl. Munduk-Kayuputih, Munduk, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
We spent 4 nights at this guest house and greatly enjoyed our stay. The rooms are very simple, but clean and keep in mind that the price is very good. The view from the balcony and terrace is just breathtaking! It is very quiet here except for the muezzin calls at 6am, 12pm, and 6pm that last 5min.
What really made our stay unforgettable was the amazing service. The owner is the kindest and most helpful man you will meet! When my bf got sick during our stay, he changed the morning breakfast to something he would like more, offered to pick up medicine for him and asked about his well-being everyday. If you are missing something from the room or have a request, don't hesitate to ask!

Munduk is a great place to experience the authentic Bali, to go trekking in the Jungle, see waterfalls, go water rafting and do canyoning. This also means that there are no tourist shops, no party night life, and "tourist restaurants"only Balinese food. Just be aware before you come here.
review 2: I returned here after a 4-yr gap, and Munduk, (unlike Ubud), has been hard-hit by Covid and lack of business:( BUT HAPPILY :) Karang Sari finally answered my calls, and are open and THRILLED to see guests returnü§∏‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüëåüëèüèºüëç. Lovely bedroom with gorgeous garden views stretching down to the valleys below.. and EXQUISITE balmy warm weather..üëèüèºüëèüèºüëèüèº.  Breakfast ideal, and the owner's son Putu runs around, trying his best to meet your needs, albeit, he is alone, for the moment. Everyone in this area needs our SUPPORT and UNDERSTANDING... HAPPY TO BE BACK HERE... thank you Putu and your Mum and Dad ..üòéüåªüëåüëèüèºüëèüèºüëèüèº oh and BTW great water pressure in shower, and ALWAYS hot..and lovely complimentary breakfast every morning üëå.. HOPEFULLY you will have a very good Summer season Putu... üëç
review 3:
got a downstairs room for 300k,  in descent condition.  No hot water in shower.  garden is very nice,  food is great and cheap,  staff is nice.
Night was noisy because of the proximity with road.  Overall good place to stay and enjoy the surrounding nature.
review 4: Very kind and helpful staff. They were very good at English and kind to help us get transportation several times. Also a great breakfast and lovely tea and coffee. Thank you for a great stay, would definitely recommend it.
review 5:
Big ventilated rooms at reasonable prices. Right on the main road and very easily accessible. Might get a bit noisy at times.

Very courteous staff. Do try the Dadar Gulung on the menu. Great local dessert.

name: Warung Pudak Tut Je
address: Jalan Banjar Dinas Jembong, Gobleg, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: If you are in Munduk, don‚Äôt miss this place!! The atmosphere, the people.. the FOOD was all incredible. These people are so kind and friendly and just want you to enjoy your time here. They want to make you happy!! I had the spring rolls and they make them here fresh accompanied with homemade sweet and sour sauce with mango, onion and sweet pepper and oh my goodness nothing like I‚Äôve ever tasted before the flavours just made me drool! For the main I had the fried noodles with chicken and fried egg‚Äî very tasteful and it‚Äôs a HUGE portion. They serve you fruit after your meal :). If you want traditional , home cooked food in a CLEAN place go here, you won‚Äôt regret it !!
review 2: A perfect place to go to near Munduk, where the food is as delicious as it is affordable! The place also has really nice owners, who do everything they can to make you leave with a smile. Would definitely recommend!
review 3: The atmosphere of this place was absolutely beautiful, so peaceful, calm and homely. Food was excellent and staff were amazing. Was given complimentary soup and dessert as well. 10/10
review 4: The food is excellent, truly! The dishes are exquisite, the portions generous, well-presented, and the quality of service is very good. We loved it! We would return if we could‚Ä¶ We went for dinner and the atmosphere is relaxed. Everything very clean. We recommend it.
review 5:
Beautiful quiet garden serving excellent food. Generous portions and lovely service. Good English too so no need to bring a translator!!
This place is well off the normal beaten path but worth a visit if in the area.
Was here for lunch but will come back again in the evening to try more.

name: Gosela Homestay
address: Jl. Gobleg, Gobleg, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: On our trip to Bali, we left Kuta and decided to head to Munduk. After doing our research, we booked three nights with breakfast included, and it was the best accommodation we could have chosen. We were welcomed at the end of the afternoon with typical dumplings and delicious tea by Nyoman. He helped us rent the motorbike the next morning and recommended lots of wurungs with delicious food. Always in a good mood, with a big smile and an extremely generous person. Every day breakfast was different with local food and when we returned from our visits, we're always welcomed with cakes and wonderful tea. The view of the countryside is very peaceful and behind the lodge there is a rice field that you can visit. On the last day, we couldn't get any transport to go to Ubud, so he arranged a transfer. If you want to go to Munduk I highly recommend this place, We'll definitely be back. We are very grateful to Nyoman and his wife.
review 2: Nice place to stay. The host is very helpful and friendly.

name: Munduk Tutub
address: Gg. Seroni, Munduk, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: Munduk Tutub is an incredible restaurant and place to stay! The staff is incredibly kind, the food and juices are fantastic, and the views of the waterfall are unbelievable. I highly recommend eating here and staying overnight if you are in Munduk!
review 2: Munduk Tutub is a veeeeryy greaaatt restaurant and homestay! delicious food, clean rooms, very comfortable and quiet, views that cannot be seen anywhere.. The owner is very kind, you will feel instantly calm here. This is a place you must visit in Bali!
review 3: What a lovely find. I stopped in for a snack and drinks and the staff are so friendly, the food and juices were fresh and tastyüôèand you can‚Äôt beat this view. Highly recommend taking a little time to enjoy.
review 4: We had a lovely dinner with a stunning view. They have a small menu with balinese food, also for vegetarian. The Dadar Gulung (Pancakes) were delicious. Also very good prices and friendly service.
review 5: Coming to this currently built restaurant with waterfall view for lunch. The food  was good with friendly staff. We were less convenient when more and more visitors came to hang around just for taking pictures when we were having our lunch. The waterfall was built with giant pipes installed from the springs, so not natural waterfall as I thought before. Not for those who love Natural beauty.

name: Sente Homestay
address: P2QW+7Q6, Munduk, Banjar, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81161, Indonesia
review 1: Nice place for relax and refreshing your mind and it is located near the waterfall,buyan lake and camping area

name: Warung Pande
address: P2PX+8MX, Munduk, Banjar, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81161, Indonesia
review 1: It's authentic Indonesian food. The make pork noodle soup as their specialty.
review 2: Good place to eat local food with lovely peoples !

name: Warung saron
address: P2RX+MQ5, Jl. Pedawa - Gobleg, Gobleg, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81161, Indonesia

name: Warung Cenik
address: P3P2+3J4, Jl. Kayu Putih - Munduk, Munduk, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81161, Indonesia
review 1: Great food, friendly owner and really cheap!

name: Kori Homestay
address: Jl. Gobleg, Munduk, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia

name: Warung jaja Lak klak Man Kembung
address: P2PX+8WQ, Jl. Kayu Putih - Munduk, Munduk, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81161, Indonesia

name: Puri pilihani hostel
address: P2PX+7M8, Munduk, Banjar, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81161, Indonesia

name: Warung 36 DD
address: P3R2+825, Jl. Gobleg, Gobleg, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81161, Indonesia

name: WR WIJAYANTI
address: P2QX+G4, Munduk, Banjar, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81161, Indonesia

name: Artomoro Bali
address: P2RX+82W, Jl. Pedawa - Gobleg, Munduk, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: One of the best place we visit in Bali, very comfortable room, very nice restourant(delitious food) and great owner)) see you again

name: Munduk Gumbleng Inn
address: br. jembong, P2RX+H6C, Gobleg, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81161, Indonesia

name: Local Bali Warung
address: P2RX+82W, Jl. Pedawa - Gobleg, Pedawa, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
The most wonderful Indonesian food in Bali! The family are super welcoming and friendly.

Having already travelled across various towns in Bali, we stayed in Munduk for five days and came to this warung every single day!

We tried a number of different vegetarian dishes and they were all exceptionally delicious! All freshly cooked and beautifully presented. After a few visits, the family offered to cook a couple of different Balinese veggie dishes for us to try off the menu which was very kind of them. Tofu pepes was the best üòã

We loved the selection of desserts on offer and tried all of them over the course of our visits. The black rice pudding was our favourite ‚ù§Ô∏è Free welcome tea with ginger and pandan leaf was great too üòä

The view to the trees in the valley is lovely both during the day and at sunset.
review 2: Best Warung in Munduk, perhaps all of Bali! We tasted many local Balinese items on the menu over several visits and struggle to say which one is best. Very fresh ingredients, delicious flavours and lovely atmosphere. Nested in the jungle, to the sound of Balinese music and river further down, beautiful surroundings and very friendly hosts! Highly recommend! :)
review 3: We already travelling 3 weeks in Bali an try a lot of good warung with good rating , but this one is the best , food so nice and delicious , big portion . Hope to return here again . Great owner and great family.
review 4: One of the best warung in Munduk - Bali, the food very deliciousüëç
review 5: One of the best restaurant , very comfort with natural views ‚ù§Ô∏è
